DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether matrix metalloproteinases are associated with atherosclerosis in the different stages of chronic kidney disease.
DOC.brief_title: Matrix Metalloproteinases in Atherosclerosis of Chronic Kidney Disease
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to determine the correlation of matrix metalloproteinases and atherosclerosis of chronic kidney disease. Patients with diabetes mellitus type 2,as a non-inflammatory leading cause of end stage renal failure and patients with chronic glomerulonephritis and similar course of proteinuria,as an inflammatory leading cause of end stage renal failure are enrolled.
DOC.criteria: Chronic kidney disease Diabetes mellitus type 2 Malignancy
